title: Lag Issues
body:
I'm lagging way too much!!

I tried this, can someone help me what all these mean?

and yes, it' a public wifi......

replies.body:
Hey Eps NT, 

Having lag issues could be a couple different issues! The most common is a bad connection between the client and server. Let's have you try[ troubleshooting that connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first. If you still experience the issue after that I would also suggest you put your client into low spec mode by going into the client settings and enabling it in general settings! 

Please let me know if you still experience the lag afterwords 
{{champion:25}}
